com.waterapps.lib

Class CustomMarker

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.waterapps.lib.CustomMarker

  • public class CustomMarker
extends java.lang.Object
    A custom Google Maps marker showing elevation information. It wraps rather than extends the Marker class because Google doesn't allow extensions of it.
